name: Horde (itch) (ubs)
description:
Collect weapons and unlock upgrades to fight an endless horde of zombies.

Zombies will evolve and learn abilities as the game progresses. Prepare yourself.

This current version is a game jam submission to the Roguelike gamejam 4: 

https://itch.io/jam/roguelike-jam-4

Please provide feedback. I plan on continuing development and releasing Horde as a full title. 

Controls - 

WASD  to move

Left click to shoot (some weapons have right click function)

Shift to sprint

Space to dash

R to reload
